Reference

Strategies

Define the strategies.

define_state() define_state_() modify(<state>)

Define a Markov Model State

define_transition() define_transition_() modify(<uneval_matrix>) plot(<uneval_matrix>)

define_part_surv() define_part_surv_()

Define Partitioned Survival

define_strategy() define_strategy_()

Define a Markov Model

define_starting_values() define_starting_values_()

Define Starting State Values

Parameters

define_parameters() define_parameters_() modify(<uneval_parameters>)

Define Markov Model Parameters

Run the model

run_model() run_model_()

Run Markov Model

define_init() define_init_()

Define Initial Counts

define_inflow() define_inflow_()

Define Inflow for a BIA

summary(<run_model>)

Summarise Markov Model Results

plot(<run_model>)

Plot Results of a Markov Model

Sensitivity analyses

Run DSA or PSA

define_dsa() define_dsa_()

Define a Sensitivity Analysis

run_dsa()

Run Sensitivity Analysis

define_psa() define_psa_()

Define Parameters Distribution for Probabilistic Analysis

normal() lognormal() gamma() binomial() multinomial() logitnormal() beta() triangle() poisson() define_distribution() beta() triangle() use_distribution()

Probability Density Functions for Probabilistic Uncertainty Analysis

define_correlation() define_correlation_()

Define a Correlation Structure for Probabilistic Uncertainty Analysis

run_psa()

Run Probabilistic Uncertainty Analysis

export_savi()

Export PSA Results for SAVI

run_bcea()

Use the BCEA package

plot(<dsa>)

Plot Sensitivity Analysis

plot(<psa>)

Plot Results of Probabilistic Analysis

Heterogeneity

update(<run_model>) plot(<updated_model>)

Run Model on New Data
